entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.Compression.GZipStream encrypt then decrypt results in diff byte sizes from original file #73192
  • string.Split not working as expected when using multiple string separators and StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries #73194
  • [wasm][aot] Perf pipeline: clang failing with `Explicit load/store type does not match pointee type of pointer operand (Producer: 'LLVM11.1.0' Reader: 'LLVM 15.0.0git')` #73184
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT crash dumps bucket all user exceptions as APPLICATION_FAULT #73183
  • [wasm] `System.Xml.XmlSerializer.Tests` crashing with AOT #73180
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Elevated exception rate after Kestrel update #73177
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce warnings for adding Requires on a static constructor #73172
  • System.Text.Json deserialize fails on List<Tuple<,>> with trimming #73169
  • [Mono] Master Issue for Missing GC APIs #73167
    8.0.0
  • CI staging build succeeds even if some tests fails there #73166
  • Invalid docker tag used on 7.0-preview5 testing #73162
  • [mono] Enable AOT compiler to generate a dependency graph of the compiled code #73159
    8.0.0
  • HttpStress and SslStress Windows builds failing in dotnet-install #73154
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Server closes connections with `USER_CANCELED` when server options callback fails #73152
  • [QUIC] Internal error (USER_CANCELLED) when trying to establish a connection #73151
  • [iOS] BigInteger CompareTo crash in CborDocument_Roundtrip test #73150
    8.0.0
  • JIT unnecessarily marks some backward jumps for tailcall-to-loop optimization #73148
    8.0.0
  • Get System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests passing with NativeAOT #73145
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: On idle connection timeout, errors thrown for streams before connection #73144
  • NativeMemory.Realloc crashes #73143
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Connection timeout has QuicError.InternalError #73141
  • HTTP/3: Enable by default? #73140
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\HugeField1\\HugeField1.cmd #73139
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\tests\\mainv1\\mainv1.cmd #73138
    7.0.0
  • Implement AOT safe DispatchProxy.Create #73136

Closed

  • Windows Server 2022 - Setting affinity in .NET 6 application errors #72441
    7.0.0
  • Remove use of pool and buffer copy in Deserialize(ref Utf8JsonReader reader, ...) #70902
    7.0.0
  • Add support for ILLink.Descriptors.xml #70810
    7.0.0
  • Port serialization discovery logic from illink #72910
    7.0.0
  • Under what circumstances can `System.Reflection.ParameterInfo.Name` be null? #73188
  • Version Bubble implementation flaw: some methods are forced to rejit #46160
    8.0.0
  • FileStream creates a file in incorrect folder, when starting as UNC path #73075
    Future
  • System.Text.Json uses inconsistent polymorphism semantics with custom `object` converters #72681
    7.0.0
  • System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add Slow #28693
    Future
  • Dynamic PGO work planned for .NET 7 #64659
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add flag to remove non-blittable marshaling functionality from the runtime #43691
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #68512
    7.0.0
  • Exception when I call SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync on net-6 android #69557
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IServiceCollection.Configure<T>(Action<T, IServiceProvider>) #73050
  • System.IO.Pipes test failures on Android #49873
    7.0.0
  • linux ThreadWaitReason Unknown #73049
  • `Console.ReadKey` returns unexpected `ConsoleKeyInfo` when pressing `Shift+End` in WSL (v2 Ubuntu 20.04) #63644
    7.0.0
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 comparing to .NET 5 when `TERM` is set to `rxvt` #63387
    7.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey and pressing SHIFT+END returns invalid escape sequence on WSL/Ubuntu #45597
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 fails to read the HOME key on ubuntu16.04 #44621
    7.0.0
  • `Console.ReadKey()` doesn't work for keys from the numeric keypad in the PuTTY ssh client #25735
    7.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey returns incomplete information for some key sequences on Linux #802
    7.0.0
  • Interop+Crypto+OpenSslCryptographicException instead of CryptographicException (AsnContentException) #72994
    Future
  • ArgumentNullException in dotnet.6.0.7.hr41unoldr.js #72457
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandlerTest.GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly fails with "Unexpected EOF trying to read request header" #71096
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\regressions\\V1\\SEH\\VJ\\MultipleException\\MultipleException.cmd #73135
  • [NativeAOT] Assert when compiling System.Runtime.Tests #73027
    7.0.0
  • Many tests fails on the device 'tvOS 13.4 (17L255) - Apple TV on [release/6.0] branch PR #72867
  • [NativeAOT] Assert in Internal_Runtime_MethodTable__get_NonClonedNonArrayBaseType #73098
  • Missing word in variable's documentation #68169
    8.0.0
  • Expression.ToString() does not show milliseconds for DateTime properties #70935

PullRequests

Created

  • increase timeout on ZeroByteRead_IssuesZeroByteReadOnUnderlyingStream test #73196
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [CI test] Use liberal VN for TLS indirects #73195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix duplicate reference issue #73193
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable AOT analyzer in System.Net.HttpListener and System.Net.Http.Json #73191
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add all memory allocation ucrtbase APIs to the hardbound list #73190
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [interp] Init Span/ReadOnlySpan fields in get_Item/get_Length intrinsics #73187
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Provide a code-fix to add missing stateful marshaller shape methods #73186
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] Adjust dynamic static variables to need less code #73185
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Wrap FileSystemEntry buffer in a struct to workaround visibility issues with api compat #73182
    area-System.IO
  • Tweak XML comments on BrotliStream and ZLibStream #73179
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make diagnostic checks more reliable with more exact result matching. #73178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][interp] Throw exception if stack is not empty after localloc #73176
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Return null for localloc with len 0 #73174
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ignoring failures due to the test machine insufficient memory #73173
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update global.json default and Version of dotnet used to test net7 Maui #73171
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests failed in CI #73170
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • [TEST] Ctor_Dispose_HandleClosedIfOwnsHandle #73168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono] Don't allow interfaces as catch classes to catch anything. #73165
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix insert a breakpoint in sources with same prefix. #73163
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [RateLimiting] Update TranslateKey to allow disposal of wrapped limiter #73160
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Fixup C exports initialization after startup.ts refactoring #73158
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Debugging Span.Reverse #73157
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm] marshling call to assembly entrypoint via new interop #73156
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings #73155
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Data.Odbc
  • Enable HTTP/3 support by default #73153
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations.PopCount in AOT mode. #73147
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix local initialization in regex conditional backreferences in loops #73164
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix handling process affinity mask on Windows 11 #69548
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable SourceGen unit tests in non-release runtime builds #73181
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Refine wording in RequiresDynamicCode annotation in JsonStringEnumConverter. #73161
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove buffer copying from Utf8JsonReader Deserialize methods. #73092
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Delete duplicate unwind info files #73129
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Add more tests that have been enabled by recent changes #73175
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Descriptor parser support #72975
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Consolidate importer spilling code V2 (#72744)" #73146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix typos #73122
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove all pinvoke source generator attributes in aggressive trimming mode #72952
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework
  • #73041 exclude Microsoft.CSharp.Tests for tvOS #73061
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use UnrelatedR2RCode flag when --compilebubblegenerics is specified #71798
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [eventpipe] Use MonoImage:module_name when filename is NULL #73018
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove ActiveIssue tag in ThreadPoolBoundHandle_IntegrationTests.netcoreapp.cs #72973
    area-System.Threading
  • Reduce the cost of adding many unnamed parameters to an OdbcCommand. #66869
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1915567 #73091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update the asp.net spmi collection script #73125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #72945
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Don't hardcode /tmp in named pipe tests, it's not for us on Android #73067
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings #73149
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • Remove static readonly fields from X500NameEncoder #73115
    area-System.Security
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Add localloc empty stack verification #73109
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Fix assert in NativeAOT when handling data flow on compiler generated… #73085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add more DataFlow tests from linker to NativeAOT #72777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add some QuicListener tests #73072
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Link issue to the RDC attribute on DispatchProxy #73137
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable more libraries tests #73104
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update description #73133
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Implement new API GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #73057
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, CoreClr
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • enable OpenSSL tests on arm64 mac #72294
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection Invoke refactoring #73131
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Fix infinite recursion and null pointer access while debugging #73024
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Describe the validity of null managed pointers #71794
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947
  • Bring back live host change #73095
  • Update zlib, zlib-intel dependencies #73082
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • JSON support required properties #73063
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][draft] re-try downloading assets #72933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix xxHash64 handling of large (> 4GB) inputs #73093
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix execution of ilverify tests in outerloop runs #73132
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • `runtime-wasm-perf`: add support for running against forks, and branches #73105
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • Optimize Enumerable.Chunk #73134
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Testing mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add support for X509ChainPolicy for QUIC #73056
    area-System.Net
  • [wip][wasm] deprecate legacy JS API and propose new #73068
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable MsQuicTests.ConnectWithClientCertificate on Windows #70015
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73020
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Disallow return buffer aliasing for unmanaged calls #73059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [mono] Skip .mibc profile methods when not found #73066
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Collect crash dumps for aborting on Unix #73037
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add AllBitsSet DIM #72961
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader when it doesn't support serialization #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add ref counting to the dotnet-counters providers #72894
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
